titleStmt.title: A counter-plea to an apostataes [sic] pardon A sermon preached at Paules Crosse vpon Shroue-Sunday, February 15. 1617. By Robert Sibthorpe, preacher of the Word of God at Waterstratforde in Buckingamshire.
titleStmt.author: Sybthorpe, Robert, d. 1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bar: Alsop, for Richard Fleming, and are to be sold at his shop at the great south-dore of Paules, on the right hand going vp the steps,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-H⁴ (-A1).
A variant of the edition with George Fairebeard as publisher in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the great south-dore of Paules, on the right hand going vp the steps
